name: wl-luk-imim2i
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: wl-luk-mpi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2), wi(w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2))
-| wi(w1, w2)
-| wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2))
-| wi(w1, w2)
-| wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)))

comment: Inference adding common antecedents in an implication. Copy of ~ imim2i with a different proof. (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 17-Dec-2018.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
